Html:
Is there such a thing as a TypeScript MVP? I really like TypeScript, so I've invested quite a bit of time trying (with some success) to help on SO.

http://stackoverflow.com/search?q=user:250094+[typescript]

And I just realized that I could probably spend more time here in this discussion group...

I'm not doing this to become an MVP specifically, but it sure would be cool knowing that it's possible.

So is it possible? :)
We don't have MVPs for TypeScript. Instead, TypeScript follows more of a "everyone chips in" open source model, so definitely feel free to chip in if you want to help out on SO (or on these forums).
